message.body: I know this is really stressful. I really want you to know that I am there for you! Please call me with any questions, though my lice survival guide is def a great reference (did u see?). Your almost done with it.
Also I think lice eat dandruff
I didn't have dandruff all summer(I'm usually flakey all year round). Now I'm back to snowy shoulders.
I'm really busy trying to deal with this, I'll call you when it's over
Well it's really difficult remember to take the time to smile. Talking to you, your compassion, was very grounding for me when I was upset, please know that I am there for you.
And once you get the malathion you should be done within 8 hours. Except for cleaning and olive oil
